title: NFL week 15
author: VD
content_html: The Jags are tough. They smacked Pittsburgh right in the mouth and the Steelers crumbled. I am also very surprised that Miami finally got a win and at the apparently boundless limits of Roy Williams’s cluelessness. When they actually name a penalty after you, how dumb do you have to be to drag down Donovan McNabb in precisely the manner that inspired the creation of the penalty.
content_text:
The Jags are tough.  They smacked Pittsburgh right in the mouth and the Steelers crumbled.  I am also very surprised that Miami finally got a win and at the apparently boundless limits of Roy Williams’s cluelessness.  When they
actually name a penalty after you
, how dumb do you have to be to drag down Donovan McNabb in precisely the manner that inspired the creation of the penalty.
